description: Get the temperature of your smoker or the internal temperature of the meat being cooked, or change the set temperature of your smoker. Requires a Flame Boss smoker controller.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell Flame Boss my device ID is 411
Alexa, ask Flame Boss to change the set temperature to 300 degrees
Alexa, ask Flame Boss for the meat temperature
name: Flame Boss
shortDescription: Monitor and control your smoker with Flame Boss
